content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][ts_section_title title=”Multilevel Marketing”][ts_text_content_block]We are offering you a business opportunity in the real estate field where you may supplement your income.

Do you know that by working with us, you can earn ₦500,000 each week/month, vacation overseas for free, drive brand new automobiles, and win a house? We’ll be with you every step of the way. To show you how we organize seminars and training throughout our offices.

Become financially independent by registering with us today.[/ts_text_content_block][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][ts_text_content_block]■ Referrals

■ Registration fee of ₦52,650.00 for Classic PBOs.

■ Registration fee of ₦37,650.00 for Gold PBOs.

■ Registration fee of ₦1,650.00 for Associate PBOs.

■ Commission from each direct sale- 2.5% to 15%

■ Commission from each downline sale- 1% to 5%[/ts_text_content_block][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][ts_text_content_block]To register kindly make payment for the preferred level of registration to:

Account Name: PBO NETWORK AND CONCERNS LIMITED
Account Number: 1212604073
Bank Name: ZENITH BANK

Once payment has been made, kindly click the Apply for Membership button below.[/ts_text_content_block][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_btn title=”APPLY FOR MEMBERSHIP” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fhttps://pwanbusinessowners.com%2Fstart%2F%3Fref%3D28|title:APPLY%20FOR%20MEMBERSHIP|target:_blank”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_video link=”https://youtu.be/fRLa-8stzPs”][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_video link=”https://youtu.be/78kvHdfJkSg”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Do you know that by working with us, you can earn ₦500,000 each week/month, vacation overseas for free, drive brand new automobiles, and win a house? We’ll be with you every step of the way.
